mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY') AS YEAR FROM TBL_ORDER O WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY YEAR DESC

SELECT O.ORDER_ID, TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY. MM. DD ') AS ORDERDATE_YEAR,TO_CHAR(ARRIVED_DATE, 'MM/DD DAY ') AS ARRIVEDDATE_DAY, O.STATUS, I.BOOK_ID, IMAGE, TITLE, I.PRICE, I.QUANTITY FROM TBL_ORDER O INNER JOIN TBL_ORDER_ITEM I ON O.ORDER_ID = I.ORDER_ID INNER JOIN TBL_BOOK B ON I.BOOK_ID= B.BOOK_ID WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} and TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY') LIKE '%'|| #{year} || '%' ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC

SELECT I.*,B.*, USER_ID, SHIPPING_ADDRESS, ARRIVED_DATE FROM TBL_ORDER O INNER JOIN TBL_ORDER_ITEM I ON O.ORDER_ID = I.ORDER_ID INNER JOIN TBL_BOOK B ON I.BOOK_ID = B.BOOK_ID WHERE O.ORDER_ID = #{orderId}
